subtasks.title: Choose main cities to visit
subtasks.description: Select the main cities to visit in Japan over the 3-day period. Select the days of staying for each city.

subtasks.title: Plan transportation and accommodation
subtasks.description: Decide how to travel between the selected cities using the best transport method (e.g. flights, bus). Also select the number of nights in each city and select the accommodation. If budget is included, adjust both transportation and accommodation accordingly.

subtasks.title: Choose activities and attractions
subtasks.description: Select local attraction, activities and cultural experiences for each region. Base your decisions on the user's preferences, if they apply.

subtasks.title: Suggest local gastronomy
subtasks.description: Recommend local dishes and culinary experiences for each region visited.

subtasks.title: Create daily itinerary
subtasks.description: Build a day-by-day travel plan that includes transportation, activities, and gastronomy.

subtasks.title: Plan the budget
subtasks.description: Estimate the total cost of the trip including transportation, accommodation, food, and activities. Adjust the plan if it exceeds the expected budget constraint by more than 10%.
